name: 3d squishy kawaii toys
description:
3D Squishy kawaii toys - a popular anti stress toys now in your phone. Bad mood? Want to calm your nerves? Here is the simplest antidepressant in the form of an application.

Squishy - squash what is it?
The English word Squishy is possibly derived from - squeeze.
This is an incredibly soothing anti stress toys in the Japanese style, which is able to undergo incredible "torment" in the form of squeezing with hands, and then quickly restore its original look. They are so pleasant to the touch, soft, resembling non-sticky Marshmallow, and they need to be pressed, squeezed, crushed! It's nice! And then watch how they smoothly take their original shape.
In our simulator kawaii you will find real 3D squishy models, in which the physics of depression is close to a real kawaii toys. Dinosaurs, ice cream, french fries, cactus, horse, cute cats, bunnies and other toys will reassure you.
Collect coins to unlock the entire squishy toys collection.
To earn coins you need to play with the virtual DIY button, for this you will receive coins, which you can later exchange for your favorite anti stress toys.

Game features:

- Real 3d squishy models
- 3d rotate
- Increase decrease model
- Hold the object to be able to move around the screen.
- Real physics
- Calming effect

Relieve stress, calm your nerves, lift your spirits.
